name: Luxury Villa with Ocean View
details: Stunning villa located on a cliff with panoramic ocean views. Features 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, spacious living areas, infinity pool, and private beach access.

name: Downtown Penthouse
details: Modern penthouse located in the heart of the city. Features floor-to-ceiling windows, open concept living space, gourmet kitchen, and rooftop terrace with city skyline views.

name: Mountain Retreat Cabin
details: Cozy cabin nestled in the mountains. Features 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, stone fireplace, wrap-around porch, and breathtaking views of the surrounding forest.

name: Beachfront Condo
details: Charming beachfront condo with direct access to the sand. Features 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, updated kitchen, spacious balcony, and resort-style amenities.

name: Country Estate
details: Elegant country estate set on sprawling acres of land. Features a grand mansion with 7 bedrooms, 6 bathrooms, formal gardens, swimming pool, and guest house.

name: City Townhouse
details: Chic townhouse located in a trendy urban neighborhood. Features 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, modern finishes, private courtyard, and attached garage.

name: Lakefront Retreat
details: Tranquil lakefront property perfect for relaxation and outdoor activities. Features a cozy cottage with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, large deck, and private dock.

name: Ski Chalet
details: Quaint ski chalet located in a prime mountain resort area. Features 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, stone fireplace, hot tub, and stunning views of the slopes.

name: Riverside Bungalow
details: Charming riverside bungalow with a serene natural setting. Features 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, wrap-around porch, and private river access for fishing and kayaking.

name: Golf Course Estate
details: Luxurious estate located on a prestigious golf course. Features a custom-built mansion with 6 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms, home theater, wine cellar, and golf course views.
